metadata.title: CVE-2023-29933 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
llvm-project commit bd456297 was discovered to contain a segmentation faultvia the component mlir::Block::getArgument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bolt-15 - 1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
clang-15 - 1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
clang-15-examples - 1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
clang-format-15 - 1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3

clang-tools-15 - 1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-15 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3').
